channel.title: computerscience on Dev Arc
channel.description: Recent content in computerscience on Dev Arc

item.title: 01 Product of Array Except Self
item.description: I have been discussing many topics in my blog but it’s time to start from the root once again. In this blog and upcoming few we’ll discuss how to attempt general competitive programming questions, no fancy data structures or algorithms, but thinking outside the box and cooking up some good enough solutions together. Understanding how code works is more important than coding an app, Understanding how your own thoughts work is even more important.
